'We should probably hurry with whatever we do next.'%K%P
We had a quick meeting before practice.%K%P
The two of them seemed to be working well with\neach other, and their performance was getting better.%K%P
Plus, by uploading bits from practice each day,\nwe were having some success in building that\nclose, community-style feeling.%K%P
Unfortunately for Shuri, most of her fans were\nfollowing to try and catch a peek, and even then,\nit's not like there were tons of them to begin with.%K%P
Objectively speaking, the duo was basically\njust a mid-level group surviving mostly on sex\nappeal, and weren't really mainstream yet.%K%P
They were missing something, and that something\nwas clearly what was keeping them from beating\ntheir competition.%K%P
'So you think we need a little\nextra boost or something?'%K%P
'We haven't really been climbing\nthe charts much lately, huh.'%K%P
We saw a good start, but that was it. \nThere was no way we were going to coast\nto the top like this.%K%P
The top 10 Divine Idols all had their fans,\nand a scrappy duo like ours had no way of cutting\nourselves a portion of them.%K%P
'We should probably settle on a duo name,\nfor starters. If we don't hurry and get rid of our\ntemp name, we'll never make it in time.'%K%P
'What do you have in mind, Yamato? \nAre you gonna poll our fans again?'%K%P
'We can't do that. \nWE formed this duo. WE need to do this ourselves.'%K%P
'Okay, let's each come up with an idea. \nMe, Kagura, and you too, Yamato.'%K%P
'Me too? Shouldn't you two do this yourselves?'%K%P
'You've been with us this whole way. \nWe aren't gonna cut you off here.'%K%P
'Exactly! And if you say you can't be bothered\nthinking about it, I'll get especially angry.'%K%P
'Okay. Well, thanks... \nI guess I'll try and think of something.'%K%P
I was just supposed to be their human rep,\na support role, but I guess at some point I became\npart of the team.%K%P
Just thinking about it made me so happy.\nI couldn't keep a smile off my face.%K%P
'So, I know it's time to start practice,\nbut here's what I was thinking.'%K%P
'When we finally decide on an official name,\nwhy don't we make a real-deal music video\nto announce it?'%K%P
We'd shared our practice sessions plenty of times. \nBut never anything that was complete and final.%K%P
It was time to put on a real performance,\nworthy of Divine Idols and finally break out\nof that erotic niche we were stuck in.%K%P
'It's probably about time, huh.'%K%P
'You sure we'll be okay?\nWe haven't even pulled it off right yet.'%K%P
'I'm aware of that.\nBut we're gonna have to do it at some point.'%K%P
'So I say, why not now? Right here, right now,\nright when we pick a name for ourselves.'%K%P
Seemingly moved by Shuri's passion,\nKagura nods enthusiastically.%K%P
The duo was going to\ndominate the auditions.%K%P
And this video would be the start of it all.%K%P
'Ready when you are.'%K%P
Camera ready, I waited to get shooting.%K%P
'I'm good to go.'%K%P
Shuri placed herself in front of the camera,\nwaiting for that switch to be pressed.%K%P
'I'm set, too.'%K%P
Kagura was bouncing on the spot,\nchecking her footing.%K%P
'Alright, aaand action!'%K%P
'Music! Start!'%K%P
She pressed play and headed right to Kagura's side.%K%P
I pressed record right as she got there.%K%P
And shortly after the intro started playing.%K%P
(That was PERFECT timing!)%K%P
The first line of the song and their steps\nwere perfectly synced.%K%P
They seemed way more in the moment\nthan during normal practice.%K%P
They were so focused on getting it right on\nthe first take, they performed better than\never before.%K%P
'Alright! We did it!'%K%P
'Whoooo! \nThat was perfect!'%K%P
They were so on-point this time around,\nit was almost impossible to imagine how\nout of time they were before.%K%P
'Kagura, thank you so much. This was all you.'%K%P
'Heh, thank you, too. \nI couldn't have done this all alone.'%K%P
They had supported each other in ways\nyou couldn't see.%K%P
You could see it in their eyes.%K%P
'Great job, you two. \nThat was your best performance yet.'%K%P
'Right? \nSee, we aren't so bad after all!'%K%P
'Now we're all set to announce our name!'%K%P
'Yeah, well, first we need to edit this video\nand actually come up with a name.'%K%P
'I've got a few ideas, what about you, Kagura?'%K%P
'Not even one...'%K%P
'Don't go thinking that's gonna fly. \nYou're a member, so you gotta do your share.'%K%P
'I know, I know. I'll think up something.'%K%P
'Looking forward to it. My partner in crime!'%K%P
